project_descr: Support to flood recovery and disaster risk mitigation and management in Bosnia and Herzegovina

outputs.output_descr: The project aims to strengthen capacities of local governments in Bosnia and Herzegovina for landslide risk mitigation. The intervention will provide support to 9 landslide- and flood-affected local governments to remediate and stabilise landslides.
